medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has been experiencing persistent abdominal pain, which prompted her visit to the ED. She has a known diverticular disease and colovesicular fistula. She has been passing flatus and having bowel movements, but has been belching persistently.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Colovesicular fistula, lung cancer, COPD, OSA, GERD, HTN, obesity, uterine cancer s/p hysterectomy.
